name: Dirty House
description:
Dirty House - An exciting 3D game that will help you relax and unwind. You are an ordinary citizen who has just been hired and you are already full of orders! Your main task is to restore perfect order in the house! Clear rooms of trash, bottles, boxes, broken trash, etc.!

As you progress through the levels, you will encounter new challenges that will require you to think creatively. Whether you can cope with this task or not is up to you to decide!

Game Features:
- Different difficulty levels
- Beautiful graphics
- Pleasant music
